description:
The full truth about the Iga ninjas` involvement in the shogun assassination plot comes to light, as well as a surprising aspect of the shogun and Oniwaban`s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 3:L`âme d`un ninja
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Three: Ninja Soul
Shougun Ansatsu Hen San: Shinobi no Tamashii
将軍暗殺篇三 忍の魂
